Get real-time weather updates for NFL and NCAA football stadiums to truly enjoy America's favorite sport. We all know there's nothing better than a football snow game. And this plugin will help make sure you don't miss those!

Key Features

*Access real-time weather data for NFL and NCAA stadiums.
*Simple dropdown menus to quickly find your team or stadium.
*Dark mode for a sleek, low-light experience.
*Offline caching for last-seen weather data.
*Temperature options: Fahrenheit (째F) and Celsius (째C).

How to Use

*Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
*Open the extension by clicking the football icon in your browser.
*Select your favorite NFL or NCAA team from the dropdown.
*View real-time weather details for their stadium.

Offline Functionality

*Last-viewed stadium weather data is cached locally.
*Works seamlessly without internet for previously loaded data.

Temperature Unit Options

*Switch between Fahrenheit (째F) and Celsius (째C) in the settings.

Dark Mode Support

*Matches your system/browser dark mode settings automatically.
*Clean, user-friendly design for any time of day.

Category

*Sports

Host Permission Use

This extension requires host permissions to access the weather API hosted on Vercel. The API provides real-time weather data for NFL and NCAA stadiums, enabling users to view accurate and timely weather updates. No personal user data is transmitted to the API, and all requests are limited to retrieving weather information for stadium coordinates.

Remote Code Use

Remote code is used to fetch data from trusted sources such as the OpenWeather API via our proxy hosted on Vercel. This is necessary to provide accurate, real-time weather information for stadiums. All code is securely deployed, and no user-provided data is processed or stored.

Storage Use

This extension uses Chrome's storage API to save user preferences, such as temperature unit selection (Fahrenheit or Celsius) and dark mode settings. Additionally, temporary weather data is cached to enable offline functionality. No personal user data is stored.
